channel.title: Dropping Items when killed! [NEED HELP]!

item.title: Dropping Items when killed! [NEED HELP]!
item.dc:creator: @kyle123321 kyle123321
item.description:
@kyle123321 wrote:

Okay i searched the whole Client.class, and client.java, there is no “applydead()”… how could I add one, and where?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2009, 07:46:09 pm[/size][hr][quote=“The Soul, post:10, topic:261994”][quote author=kyle123321 link=topic=346008.msg2666281#msg2666281 date=1234574901]

Your ApplyDead() method is ‘public boolean ApplyDead() {’.

Ok so how did I fix it?
[/quote]

Post your ApplyDeath() method and I’ll see as to why you’re having this problem.[/quote]

Okay i searched the whole Client.class, and client.java, there is no “applydead()”… how could I add one, and where?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2009, 07:58:23 pm[/size][hr]Please someone help I’ve port forwarded I want to start advertising, my server but I need your help first please! Someone help me! :’(

Read full topic

Your ApplyDead() method is ‘public boolean ApplyDead() {’.

Ok so how did I fix it?

okay i didn’t know I couldn’t give rep, and this is not off topic??? wtf i need help and I’m asking.[/quote]
Sorry, you must have misinterpreted my post. I meant that MY post was off topic.

On Topic: Just check your ApplyDead() method and change anything that is necessary.

item.title: Dropping Items when killed! [NEED HELP]!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“kyle123321, post:5, topic:261994”][quote author=Darkning link=topic=346008.msg2666254#msg2666254 date=1234573709]
make sure you backup your files before adding this:

[code] // If killed apply dead
if (deathStage == 1) {
if (attacknpc > 0) { // was killed by a npc -bakatool
server.npcHandler.ResetAttackPlayer(attacknpc);
}
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();

		deathStage = 2;
		poisoned = false;
		poisonDmg = false;
		fighting = false;
		hits = 0;
		startAnimation(0x900);
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
		playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
		playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
		playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
		playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
		playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]);
		sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687);
		resetfollowers();
		refreshSkills();
		killMyNPCs();
		resetKnight();
		skulledBy = "";
	}
	if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {
	client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
	youdied();
	killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+".");
	}
	if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
		toX = 2399;
		toY = 5171;
		inPitsGame = false;
		PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1;
		AtkPray = 0;
		StrPrayer = 0;
		DefPray = 0;
		RangePray = 0;
		MagePray = 0;
		PrayHeal = false;
		ProtItem = false;
		ProtMage = false;
		ProtRange = false;
		ProtMelee = false;
		Redemption = false;
		Retribution = false;
		Smite = false;
		Chivalry = false;
		Piety = false;
		isSkulled = false;
		lastSkull = 0;
		headIcon = 0;
		turnpray();
		heightLevel = 0;
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		deathStage = 0;
		resetAnimation();
		frame1();
		prayOn = false;
		AntiTeleDelay = 0;
		EntangleDelay = 0;
		sM("Oh dear you have died!");
        		resetOtherAtk();
		followID = 0;
		followID2 = 0;
	}
	if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && IsInFightCave()) {
	toX = 2439;
	toY = 5169;
		AtkPray = 0;
		StrPrayer = 0;
		DefPray = 0;
		RangePray = 0;
		MagePray = 0;
		PrayHeal = false;
		ProtItem = false;
		ProtMage = false;
		ProtRange = false;
		ProtMelee = false;
		Redemption = false;
		Retribution = false;
		Smite = false;
		Chivalry = false;
		Piety = false;
		isSkulled = false;
		lastSkull = 0;
		headIcon = 0;
		turnpray();
		heightLevel = 0;
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		deathStage = 0;
		resetAnimation();
		frame1();
		prayOn = false;
		sM("Oh dear you have died!");
        		resetOtherAtk();
	}
	if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
		toX = 2999+misc.random(3);
		toY = 3377+misc.random(3);
		AtkPray = 0;
		StrPrayer = 0;
		DefPray = 0;
		RangePray = 0;
		MagePray = 0;
		PrayHeal = false;
		ProtItem = false;
		ProtMage = false;
		ProtRange = false;
		ProtMelee = false;
		Redemption = false;
		Retribution = false;
		Smite = false;
		Chivalry = false;
		Piety = false;
		isSkulled = false;
		lastSkull = 0;
		headIcon = 0;
		turnpray();
		heightLevel = 0;
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		deathStage = 0;
		resetAnimation();
		frame1();
		prayOn = false;
		sM("Oh dear you have died!");
        		resetOtherAtk();
		if (destruct)
		{
				absX = 2999+misc.random(3);
				absY = 3377+misc.random(3);
		}
		savegame(false);
	}[/code]

try changing it with that code.
[/quote]

It didn’t work I just tested it and nothing happened, except it said I was hitting 0’s but his life was going down, but that doesn’t matter I still need the items drop thingy I’ll Rep ++[/quote]
This is off topic, but do not offer rep when you can’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Dropping Items when killed! [NEED HELP]!
item.dc:creator: @kyle123321 kyle123321
item.description:
@kyle123321 wrote:

Hello, I’m Kyle.

I’m currently using a source called “PwnScape.” But I have 1 problem, everything about the server is cool I love the source, but I don’t understand how to fix 1 thing when your pking for some reason you don’t lose your items once you die, I was wondering if someone could help me fix this problem, I’d like that if you killed the player you’d be able to receive all their items! Please help someone!

P.S if you need client.java file or something just leave a post, I’ll get it right away, I’m new to scripting, so I’d like to just COPY + PASTE please

This is my Death File

[code]// If killed apply dead
if (deathStage == 3) {
client p = getClient(duel_with);
teleblock = false;
deathStage = 4;
p.DuelVictory();
ResetAttack();
poisoned = false;
poisonDmg = false;
fighting = false;
hits = 0;
startAnimation(0x900);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]);
sendFrame126(“Prayer: “+playerLevel[5]+”/”+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687);
resetfollowers();
refreshSkills();
}
if (deathStage == 4 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {
toX = 3377+misc.random(1);
toY = 3273+misc.random(4);
AtkPray = 0;
StrPrayer = 0;
DefPray = 0;
RangePray = 0;
MagePray = 0;
PrayHeal = false;
ProtItem = false;
ProtMage = false;
ProtRange = false;
ProtMelee = false;
Redemption = false;
Retribution = false;
Smite = false;
Chivalry = false;
Piety = false;
isSkulled = false;
lastSkull = 0;
headIcon = 0;
turnpray();
heightLevel = 0;
currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
deathStage = 0;
resetAnimation();
frame1();
prayOn = false;
AntiTeleDelay = 0;
EntangleDelay = 0;
sM(“You have lost the duel!”);
resetOtherAtk();
followID = 0;
followID2 = 0;
}
// If killed apply dead
if (deathStage == 1) {
if (attacknpc > 0) { // was killed by a npc -bakatool
server.npcHandler.ResetAttackPlayer(attacknpc);
}
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();

		deathStage = 2;
		poisoned = false;
		poisonDmg = false;
		fighting = false;
		hits = 0;
		startAnimation(0x900);
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
		playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
		playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
		playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
		playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
		playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]);
		sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687);
		resetfollowers();
		refreshSkills();
		killMyNPCs();
		resetKnight();
		skulledBy = "";
	}
	client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
	youdied();
	killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+".");
	if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
		toX = 2399;
		toY = 5171;
		inPitsGame = false;
		PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1;
		AtkPray = 0;
		StrPrayer = 0;
		DefPray = 0;
		RangePray = 0;
		MagePray = 0;
		PrayHeal = false;
		ProtItem = false;
		ProtMage = false;
		ProtRange = false;
		ProtMelee = false;
		Redemption = false;
		Retribution = false;
		Smite = false;
		Chivalry = false;
		Piety = false;
		isSkulled = false;
		lastSkull = 0;
		headIcon = 0;
		turnpray();
		heightLevel = 0;
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		deathStage = 0;
		resetAnimation();
		frame1();
		prayOn = false;
		AntiTeleDelay = 0;
